reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater amazingly soft and appreciate its luxurious feel, with one noting it's a wool blend.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and soft
items.body: I love these sweaters! I have four of them! In fact they are my favorite sweaters. These sweaters have a quality that is very rare. They are made of cotton and wool. What a brilliant idea.The cotton is on inside next to your skin, wool is on outside- this combination is perfect for any cooler weather. These sweaters don‚Äôt really have any smell- what you do smell is the natural oils of wool, if this is a sensitive matter a little perfume on the skin masks any very mild odor. I am impressed with the beautiful designs and colors of these very comfortable sweaters. I am 5‚Äô so it‚Äôs difficult to find something that doesn‚Äôt look like a mini dress ( ok if 16) but I‚Äôm 84 & 5‚Äô . Read more
items.author: Marion Boshell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seriously SO soft and adorable graphic.
items.body: I did read a ton of the reviews before purchasing and the comments on softness are true. The quality is beyond what I expected. Very pleasantly surprised. I am hesitant on prints/graphics that look like they are screened or transferred but the pattern is part of the sweater itself...woven into the fabric. So the feel is all smooth to the touch. I am 5.5" and 115lbs with small frame and the SMALL is a very loose, roomy fit but I wanted it that way. The sleeve length is perfect for me (my shoulder to wrist measurement is 23"). Full snowman graphic on front & back and trees on the sleeves. I teetered between the grey and the blue but the blue was on sale so got that one and very glad as it is a beautiful and unique shade. Read more
items.author: Frank W.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holy SOFT!!!!!
items.body: Ok, I am here to tell you that this is the most beautiful, the softest, the most comfortable sweater I‚Äôve ever owned!! I already ordered another pattern. I hope it‚Äôs as utterly gorgeous as my snowman sweater!! I don‚Äôt normally buy seasonal patterns but decided to this year. So happy I did!! Nice and long for butt coverage and not sloppy looking. Get one!!!! I also bought three of the following underscrub tshirts so I don‚Äôt itch. ( Healing Hands Women's Underscrub Soft Knit Melissa Longsleeve Scrub Tee with Breathable & Easy Care Fabric 5047) I highly recommend these soft long sleeve undershirts if you have an issue with the wool in the sweater. They don‚Äôt add any weight or heat in my opinion. Happy sweatering!! Read more
items.author: B. Gill

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Warm & Soft
items.body: This sweater is warm! And the fabric is very soft and cozy, it also washes up well. I liked the pattern and colors too. What I'm not crazy about is the style, think 'box with sleeves'. It does look great on the model, not so much on me. But if you're looking for cozy winter wear while binge watching a favorite show or need a good sweater for that trip to the cabin this would be a good choice. Read more
items.author: jotitdown

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and beautiful - not "ugly" - Chtristmas sweater!
items.body: Soft and beautiful - not "ugly" - Chtristmas sweater! 56.3% cotton + 43.7% wool - feels like cashmere! Quality and thickness is just right foot wearing by itself or layered - very versatile! Great value! True to size. (Maybe slightly on the big side, but I like that) Read more
items.author: AD

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and so soft
items.body: This sweater is tunic length, purr-fect üê± for leggings. I'm 5'10" and an XL just covers my booty. The tag says 56.3% cotton and 43.7% wool, maybe, but the sweater has stretch from somewhere. Love how soft and warm this material is though, medium weight, and the colors are just as shown. The kitty sweater has colors of light pink, pale peach, gray, light lavender, muted orange, and rust, if you're trying to match it to other items. Read more
items.author: PammyG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT!!
items.body: I have looked at this sweater many times but kept telling myself no. I fully expected this thing to arrive and be a very cheap, ugly sweater that I hated...the total opposite. I couldn't wait to wear this sweater and show it off. I picked the polar bear as I just loved the fun-ness of it; I also have my eye on one of the snowmen. The material this sweater is made of is cotton and wool, and it feels awesome on, not to heavy nor too light - just right. I kept telling people to feel my shirt because it is so silky smooth you really want people to get the whole experience. The design is printed on, so it isn't a true sweater in that regards. There is a seam that goes down the entire top of the sleeve, but it doesn't detract from the shirt or the design, on mine the strips do not match up but I do not care as it isn't that big of a deal on this type of design. This is an oversize cut sweater and definitely long enough to cover the behind. So, if you are on the fence about this sweater - go ahead and purchase it, you will not be sorry. Read more
items.author: Stephanie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poor quality along the seams
items.body: I wanted to love this sweater given all the positive reviews. The material is soft and does not itch as others have said. The fit is huge and there is stretch in the material. It is long in the sleeves and wider than longer in the body, so sizing up does make you look heavier. The stitching was poor along the sleeve. It did not line up and the beige inside color showed at the shoulder and along the inside of the arm. The front and back were sewn at the sleeves which was not ideal. I tried to exchange the item as well and still had the same issue with the sleeve seam. It should be better at this price. I returned the item. Read more
items.author: Hockeytown0905

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Floral 175, Floral 064, Floral 163, Floral 174, Floral 185, S01 as Picture102, S01 as Picture157, S01 as Picture121, S01 as Picture35, S01 as Picture153, S01 as Picture63, S01 as Picture31, S01 as Picture10, S01 as Picture65. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
